EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_IDC_Cloud Architecture_Q216.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Pivotal sponsored IDC Technology Spotlight, Transformation in the Age of the 3rd Platform: The Role of Cloud Architecture. We hope you find it informative and useful!
If you would like more information or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its digital transformation journey, donâ€™t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team For in depth presentations on cloud-native topics and everything else to do with delivering software, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email-confirmation&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=asset-download-confirmation]]>, taking place December 4-7, 2017 in San Francisco.
